Subject: Detection - Intruder Alert CF (Concerns all Maxis)
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Chordate:



Chordate looked across at the scanners at the usual checked time, yelling.
Activating his comm., he spoke to Kluster. 

"Kluster, it's Chordate.  A transmission to the Predacon base is eminating 
from one of the CF's rooms.  I've tracked the room.  I'm going to seal it and 
have a few Maxis guard it until we're ready to move in."

Chordate pressed a few buttons, initiating a security lock down for the room 
sending out the transmission (The one BrightBlade is in).  

The only door to the room seals shut, only being able to be opened via the 
bridge, and the 'air vents' sealed shut, a steel plate coming down from the 
inside and shutting behind it, making the only air vent unaccessable.

Three feet behind that one, several bars 5 inches wide slid upwards, locking 
to form another barrier.

---

Chordate looked at the scanners once more.  

"No energy signature, slag I hate cloaking devices." Chordate activated the 
fire systems, several sprinklers activating in the room, foam flame retardent 
erupting out of the side of the walls all over.

Chordate activated the intercom.  "Attention, intruder, you're never going to 
get out, that is all."

Chordate chuckled, reactivating the intercom.  "I request at least three 
Maximals to go to (saying the name of the room doesn't work for me, so let's 
pretend Chordate just did, since I have no idea what room BrightBlade picked, 
but Chordate's scanners would), there is a cloaked intruder there.  It is 
sealed shut.  I will wait till you get there, and advise youf urther."
